person.persName: Henry Smiley (caldwell co, ky, farmer, pvt (csa))

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel Smiley and Isabel Smiley. Resident in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Long Pond in 1860. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Mounted Infantry (C.S.A.) as a private from August 19, 1861.
